Blacknightmare::

Blacknightmare walked towards IGL's exit and she stopped there. She 
doubted, what if she came back and died in the IGL? at least that 
would be better than die in Infectrons' hands... But Orchestra said 
that he would help her but... she didn't like that he get hurted.
